text: Hi Ignacio, what kind of information were you hoping to detect/collect?
If you could provide me with an example or a scenario I will see if it possible :slightly_smiling_face:

<@UDDJG2VFG> I tried this but it was unsuccessful so I gave up.

```const REDIRECT_URI = `<http://localhost>:${ PORT }/oauth-callback` || `<https://mydomain.com/oauth-callback>`;```

Hey :wave: node js developers, I'm curious about what you use to execute a script on a specific date?

I'm about to code a script to delay the creation of deal to a specific date. I could calculate the delay time in milliseconds using moment js but I was wondering if you guys know something to delay execution to a specific date in a shorter way.

Thanks
Hey guys! Does anybody use webhooks for system updates instead of the API?
How far in the future will you be scheduling the task?

I'd look at going the reverse route, setting it up as a serverless function on AWS or Firebase or a similar service. Then you can schedule the execution using their tools, and don't need to worry about if the system goes down or anything
I'm coding something using webhook for the first time these days
Ah, yeah, I wouldn’t expect that to work :confused:

I agree with <@U26BLKGE4>, especially if you’re scheduling events that far in the future. If you don’t want to handle too much bootstrapping, look at something like <https://serverless.com/framework/docs/providers/aws/events/schedule/>
